name: Cordelia
summary_text: Following an incident in her past, Cordelia now lives with her twin sister, Caroline in their late father's basement flat.

name: Shimmer Lake
summary_text: An inventive crime thriller told backwards -- reversing day by day through a week -- following a local sheriff's quest to unlock the mystery of three small town criminals and a bank heist gone wrong.

name: Pagglait
summary_text: Widowed soon after marriage, a young woman grapples with an inability to grieve, quirky relatives and a startling discovery about her late husband.

name: Greed
summary_text: Satire about the world of the super-rich.

name: The Unborn
summary_text: A young woman fights the spirit that is slowly taking possession of her.

name: Fantastic Planet
summary_text: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

name: Cold Feet
summary_text: The show follows the lives of 30-something couples Adam and Rachel, Pete and Jenny, David and Karen as they navigate love and life in Manchester.

name: The Simpsons Movie
summary_text: After Homer pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons are declared fugitives.

name: The Devils
summary_text: In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier seeks to protect the city of Loudun from the corrupt establishment of Cardinal Richelieu. Hysteria occurs within the city when he is accused of witchcraft by a sexually repressed nun.

name: Love Jones
summary_text: Darius Lovehall is a young black poet in Chicago who starts dating Nina Mosley, a beautiful and talented photographer. While trying to figure out if they've got a "love thing" or are just "...                See full summary »

name: Fat Albert
summary_text: Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids come to life and step out of their animated, inner-city Philadelphia world.

name: Lucas
summary_text: A socially inept fourteen-year-old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends - Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love - fall for each other.

name: Xanadu
summary_text: A struggling artist living in Los Angeles meets a girl who may hold the key to his happiness.

name: Blair Witch
summary_text: After discovering a video showing what he believes to be his vanished sister Heather, James and a group of friends head to the forest believed to be inhabited by the Blair Witch.

name: El Dragón: Return of a Warrior
summary_text: After the murder of his parents when he was a little kid, Mexican Miguel Garza is sent away to Japan. 20 years later, he has to go back to his home country as the new heir of his family's cartel.

name: Short Cuts
summary_text: The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents.

name: J. Edgar
summary_text: J. Edgar Hoover, powerful head of the F.B.I. for nearly fifty years, looks back on his professional and personal life.

name: Bandits
summary_text: Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.

A modern and stylish kaleidoscope of interconnected love and relationships linking characters from different cities and countries in a vivid, suspenseful and deeply moving tale of romantic life in the 21st century.

name: The War of the Worlds
summary_text: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

name: Emergence
summary_text: A police chief investigates a case involving a young child found near the site of a mysterious accident.

name: Gran Hotel
summary_text: The story of a family-owned hotel set in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905 which is scene to love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives and residential employees.

name: The Dark Tower
summary_text: TV pilot based on Stephen King's 'Dark Tower' series.

name: Escape from Alcatraz
summary_text: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

name: Heartbreak Ridge
summary_text: Hard-nosed, hard-living Marine Gunnery Sergeant Tom Highway (Clint Eastwood) clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

name: Spy City
summary_text: An English spy who is sent to Berlin in 1961 to sift out a traitor in the UK Embassy or among the Allies, shortly before the construction of the Berlin Wall.

name: Rumor Has It...
summary_text: Sarah Huttinger is a woman who learns that her family was the inspiration for the book and film "The Graduate" -- and that she just might be the offspring of the well-documented event.

name: The Rescuers
summary_text: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

name: Andor
summary_text: Prequel series to Star Wars' 'Rogue One', following the adventures of Cassian Andor during the formative years of the Rebellion.

name: The Frankenstein Chronicles
summary_text: Inspector John Marlott investigates a series of crimes in 19th Century London, which may have been committed by a scientist intent on re-animating the dead.

name: Half Baked
summary_text: The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.

name: Nail Bomber: Manhunt
summary_text: This documentary tells the story of the 1999 London bombings that targeted minority communities, and the race to find the far-right extremist behind them.

name: Gods and Generals
summary_text: The rise and fall of confederate general Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson, as he meets with military success against the Union from 1861 to 1863, when he is accidentally killed by his own soldiers.

name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
summary_text: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths.

name: Tokyo Ghoul: re
summary_text: Two years have passed since the CCG's raid on Anteiku. Although the atmosphere in Tokyo has changed drastically due to the increased influence of the CCG, ghouls continue to pose a problem ...                See full summary »

name: Naked Lunch
summary_text: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally kills his wife, and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

name: The Powerpuff Girls
summary_text: Three super-powered little girls constantly save the world (or at least the city of Townsville) from monsters, would-be conquerers and a few other gross things.

name: Making It
summary_text: Amy Poehler and Nick Offerman host a crafting series where incredibly talented people come together for a friendly competition.

name: Stardust
summary_text: Stardust will chronicle the young David Bowie's first visit to the US in 1971 - a trip that inspired the invention of his iconic alter ego Ziggy Stardust.

name: Courage Under Fire
summary_text: A U.S. Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

name: Shadowplay
summary_text: Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war.

name: Fallout: New Vegas
summary_text: After surviving a bullet to the head, Courier Six traverses the post-apocalyptic Mojave desert in search of the men who wronged him, while making an impact on thousands in the process.

name: Far from Heaven
summary_text: In 1950s Connecticut, a housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.

name: River
summary_text: John River is a brilliant police inspector whose genius lies side-by-side with the fragility of his mind. He is a man haunted by the murder victims whose cases he must lay to rest.

name: The Detective
summary_text: Police detective Joe Leland investigates the murder of a gay man. While investigating, he discovers links to official corruption in New York City in this drama that delves into a world of sex and drugs.

name: Tell Me You Love Me
summary_text: A drama about three couples and the therapist they share.

name: Everybody's Talking About Jamie
summary_text: Feature film adaptation of the musical about a teenager from Sheffield, England who wants to be a drag queen.

name: The Reason I Jump
summary_text: Based on the book by Naoki Higashida, this immersive film explores the experiences of non-speaking autistic people around the world.

name: Italian Studies
summary_text: A writer loses her memory. Adrift in NYC, she connects with a group of teenagers - in conversations both real and imagined - and searches for a way home.

name: Surrogates
summary_text: Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.

name: Raw Deal
summary_text: A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.

name: Southland Tales
summary_text: During a three-day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets up with a porn star who is developing her own reality TV project, and a policeman who holds the key to a vast conspiracy.

name: Bandit
summary_text: After escaping a Michigan prison, a daring career criminal assumes a new identity in Canada and goes on to rob a record 63 banks and jewellery stores while being hunted by a rogue task force. Based on the story of The Flying Bandit.

name: Soul Plane
summary_text: Things get raucously funny aboard the maiden flight of a black-owned airline, thanks to some last-minute passenger additions.

name: The Hunger
summary_text: A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

name: Valeria
summary_text: Valeria is a writer who's hit a dead end with both her writing and her husband. She finds solace in her three friends Carmen, Lola and Nerea.

name: Hit and Run
summary_text: Former getaway driver Charles Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charles' former gang chase them on the road.

name: Spree
summary_text: Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.

name: Guilt
summary_text: Two brothers accidentally run over and kill an old man. Despite covering their tracks, their lives start to fall apart when neighbors and relatives of the dead man begin to have doubts about the way he died.

name: Marathon Man
summary_text: A history student becomes caught in the middle of a dangerous international plot involving Nazis, stolen jewels, and government agents.

name: Vacancy
summary_text: A married couple becomes stranded at an isolated motel and finds hidden video cameras in their room. They soon realize that unless they escape, they'll be the next victims of a snuff film.

name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
summary_text: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

name: Making a Murderer
summary_text: Filmed over a 10-year period, Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.

name: Pacific Rim: The Black
summary_text: After Kaiju ravage Australia, two siblings pilot a Jaeger to search for their parents, encountering new creatures, seedy characters and chance allies.

name: Family Affair
summary_text: Bill's comfortable lifestyle must change when he receives a group of unexpected, long-term, guests.

name: The Snowtown Murders
summary_text: Based on true events, 16 year-old Jamie falls in with his mother's new boyfriend and his crowd of self-appointed neighborhood watchmen, a relationship that leads to a spree of torture and murder.

name: Queen Sugar
summary_text: Follows the life of three siblings, who move to Louisiana to claim an inheritance from their recently departed father - an 800-acre sugarcane farm.

name: The Hills Have Eyes
summary_text: On the way to California, a family has the misfortune to have their car break down in an area closed to the public, and inhabited by violent savages ready to attack.

name: Primeval
summary_text: When strange anomalies start to appear all over England, Professor Cutter and his team must track down and capture all sorts of dangerous prehistoric creatures from Earth's distant past and near future.

name: Dracula 2000
summary_text: A group of thieves breaks into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

name: Conspiracy Theory
summary_text: A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

name: Jade
summary_text: A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still loves.

name: The Net
summary_text: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

name: No Time for Sergeants
summary_text: Will Stockdale is a country bumpkin drafted into the Air Force and too dumb to realize he's driving everyone around him crazy, no one more than Sergeant King.

name: Breaking Away
summary_text: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

name: The 6th Day
summary_text: A man meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.

name: The Untouchables
summary_text: Special Agent Eliot Ness and his elite team of incorruptable agents battle organized crime in 1930s Chicago.

name: On Golden Pond
summary_text: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

name: Catfish: The TV Show
summary_text: Nev Schulman and Max Joseph help people who have fallen in love online test the authenticity of their lovers' identities.

name: The Saint in New York
summary_text: Simon Templar, the Saint, is brought to New York. His search for the identity of "the Big Fellow" takes him through many dangerous situations.

name: The Outfit
summary_text: The film follows Leonard, an English tailor who used to craft suits on London's world-famous Savile Row. But after a personal tragedy, he's ended up in Chicago, operating a small tailor ...                See full summary »

name: Come Play
summary_text: A monster named Larry manifests itself through smart phones and mobile devices. Feature film version of the 2017 short film.

name: Overlord
summary_text: A young man is trapped within a video game as a warrior king, and sets out to make this new world his own empire.

name: Sorcerer
summary_text: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

name: Intimacy
summary_text: A failed London musician meets once a week with a woman for a series of intense sexual encounters to get away from the realities of life. But when he begins inquiring about her, it puts their relationship at risk.

name: 12 Hour Shift
summary_text: Bodies start to pile up when a drug-user nurse and her cousin try to find a replacement kidney for an organ trafficker.

name: Chariots of Fire
summary_text: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew, and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

name: The Comancheros
summary_text: Texas Ranger Jake Cutter arrests gambler Paul Regret, but soon finds himself teamed with his prisoner in an undercover effort to defeat a band of renegade arms merchants and thieves dealing with the Comanches known as Comancheros.

name: Waiting to Exhale
summary_text: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with the male gender.

name: Laramie
summary_text: It is the 1870s in the Wyoming Territory, Slim Sherman and his fourteen-year-old brother Andy try to hang on to their ranch after their father's death.

name: Beruseruku
summary_text: Guts, "The Black Swordsman", is pursued by demons who are attracted to him, due to a demonic brand on his neck. His goal is to free himself, and his lover Casca, of this inescapable curse. ...                See full summary »

name: Paper Towns
summary_text: After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.

name: The Guard
summary_text: An unorthodox Irish policeman with a confrontational personality is partnered with an up-tight F.B.I. agent to investigate an international drug-smuggling ring.

name: Vacation Friends
summary_text: A couple meets up with another couple while on vacation in Mexico, but their friendship takes an awkward turn when they get back home.

name: Quest for Fire
summary_text: This story takes place in prehistoric time when three tribesmen search for a new fire source.

name: The Other Two
summary_text: An aspiring actor and his sister Brooke, a former professional dancer, try to find their place in the world while wrestling with their feelings about their 13-year-old brother Chase's sudden rise to internet fame.

name: Damien: Omen II
summary_text: Damien the Antichrist, now about to turn thirteen years old, finally learns of his destiny under the guidance of an unholy disciple of Satan. Meanwhile dark forces begin to eliminate all those who suspect the child's true identity.

name: Kim Possible
summary_text: Heroes Kim and Ron face the problems of starting high school as freshmen when their team gets an addition. Every hero needs a villain and one's just been sprung from prison. Will Kim save the world again or will high school bog her down?

name: Solace
summary_text: Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer.

name: Bicentennial Man
summary_text: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

name: Mr. Brooks
summary_text: A well-respected businessman is sometimes controlled by his murder and mayhem-loving alter ego.

name: Whip It
summary_text: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with small-town misery after discovering a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

name: Mortal Kombat Legends: Scorpion's Revenge
summary_text: Hanzo Hasashi loses his clan, family, and his life during an attack by a rival ninja clan the Lin Kuei. He is given the chance by to compete in an inter-dimensional tournament to save his ...                See full summary »

name: Treme
summary_text: Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.

name: Escape From Spiderhead
summary_text: In the near future, convicts are offered the chance to volunteer as medical subjects to shorten their sentence. One such subject for a new drug capable of generating feelings of love begins questioning the reality of his emotions.

name: Nikita
summary_text: Convicted felon, Nikita, isn't going to jail; she's given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

name: Crazy Heart
summary_text: A faded country music musician is forced to reassess his dysfunctional life during a doomed romance that also inspires him.

name: A Tale of Two Sisters
summary_text: A family is haunted by the tragedies of deaths within the family.

name: Thank You for Smoking
summary_text: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his 12-year old son.

name: Star Wars Resistance
summary_text: Kazuda Xiono, a young pilot for the Resistance, is tasked with a top secret mission to investigate the First Order, a growing threat in the galaxy.

name: Day Shift
summary_text: A hard-working, blue-collar dad who just wants to provide a good life for his quick-witted 8-year-old daughter. His mundane San Fernando Valley pool cleaning job is a front for his real source of income: hunting and killing vampires.

name: Reaper
summary_text: On his 21st birthday, Sam discovers his parents sold his soul to the devil before birth and he must now be a bounty hunter for the devil until he dies.

name: Police Academy 4: Citizens on Patrol
summary_text: The misfit Police Academy (1984) graduates now are assigned to train a group of civilian volunteers to fight crime once again plaguing the streets.

name: As the World Turns
summary_text: The focus in on the upper class Hughes and Stewart families plus their tribulations in Midwest Oakdale. The Stewarts fade away eventually to be replaced by the rural Snyders and wealthy Lucinda Walsh with her many intrigues.

name: The Book of Henry
summary_text: With instructions from her genius son's carefully crafted notebook, a single mother sets out to rescue a young girl from the hands of her abusive stepfather.

name: This Is England '86
summary_text: Shaun has just finished his final exams and he realizes he is no longer a kid. It's mid 80's England, and the gang are back, looking for a laugh, a job and something that resembles a future.

name: Human Capital
summary_text: The lives of two different families collide when their children begin a relationship that leads to a tragic accident.

name: Oliver & Company
summary_text: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

name: Until Dawn
summary_text: A group of teenagers spend the weekend in a ski lodge on the anniversary of their friends' disappearance, unaware that they are not alone.

name: The Fall Guy
summary_text: The adventures of a film stuntman who moonlights as a bounty hunter when movie work is slow.

name: 1000 Ways to Die
summary_text: Several different deaths based on true stories.

name: Flatliners
summary_text: Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.

name: Hope Gap
summary_text: A couple's visit with their son takes a dramatic turn when the father tells him he plans on leaving his mother.

name: The Wicker Man
summary_text: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

name: The Water Diviner
summary_text: An Australian man travels to Turkey after the Battle of Gallipoli to try and locate his three missing sons.

name: Stars Fell on Alabama
summary_text: A Hollywood agent returns to his Alabama hometown for 15 year high school reunion. His old schoolmates think, he's dating and bringing a famous movie star with him. He asks a cute client for a favor.

name: Les Misérables in Concert: The 25th Anniversary
summary_text: A celebratory 25th anniversary concert performance of the hit musical at The O2 in London.

name: Wonder Egg Priority
summary_text: While on a midnight stroll, a girl named Ai picks up an egg. A voice coaxes her: "If you want to change the future, you only need to choose now. Now, believe in yourself and break the egg." What awaits Ai after the breaking of the egg?

name: American Rust
summary_text: A compelling family drama that will explore the tattered American dream through the eyes of complicated and compromised chief of police Del Harris (Daniels) in a Rust Belt town in southwest Pennsylvania.

name: Jexi
summary_text: Phil makes top 10 pop lists at work. His only "friend" is cellphone Siri. His new phone includes AI helper Jexi, who improves/controls his social life.

name: Bicycle Thieves
summary_text: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

name: Identity Thief
summary_text: Mild mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.

name: The Loft
summary_text: Five married guys secretly share a penthouse loft in the city where they can carry out hidden affairs. But the fantasy becomes a nightmare, when they discover the dead body of a woman in the loft one of the group must be involved.

name: Hustle & Flow
summary_text: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

name: Camelot
summary_text: When King Uther dies and Britain faces chaos, Merlin presents an unknown named Arthur as the new king by birthright, as the late king's son, against the ambitious desires of his half-sister, Morgan.

name: Sleeping with Other People
summary_text: A good-natured womanizer and a serial cheater form a platonic relationship that helps reform them in ways, while a mutual attraction sets in.

name: The Young Riders
summary_text: The adventures of the riders of the Pony Express.

name: Last Looks
summary_text: A disgraced ex-cop seeks solace by moving to the woods, but his quiet life comes to an end when a private eye recruits him to investigate a murder.

name: Mr. Deeds
summary_text: A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.

name: Labor Day
summary_text: Depressed single mom Adele and her son Henry offer a wounded, fearsome man a ride. As police search town for the escaped convict, the mother and son gradually learn his true story as their options become increasingly limited.

name: United States of Tara
summary_text: A woman struggles to find a balance between her dissociative identity disorder and raising a dysfunctional family.

name: Mary and Max
summary_text: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

name: Yesilçam: Bir Sinema Hayvani
summary_text: Showcasing Turkey of the 1960s, while it follows a film producer who will tell the story of survival in Yesilcam as he experiences the golden age of Turkish cinema.

name: Rock Dog 2: Rock Around the Park
summary_text: When Bodi and his band 'True Blue' leave Snow Mountain, to tour with pop sensation, Lil' Foxy, they learn that fame comes at a price.

name: Drishyam
summary_text: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: Mirror Mirror
summary_text: An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.

name: Northern Rescue
summary_text: After his wife dies, search and rescue commander John West uproots his three children, moving from Boston to his rural hometown of Turtle Island Bay. The death affects each of their lives as John and his kids cope with their loss.

name: Work It
summary_text: When Quinn Ackerman's admission to the college of her dreams depends on her performance at a dance competition, she forms a ragtag group of dancers to take on the best squad in school...now she just needs to learn how to dance.

name: Kim Possible
summary_text: A high school cheerleader and her accident-prone best friend balance their duties as global crime-fighters with the typical challenges of adolescence.

name: SMILF
summary_text: A single, 20-something mom struggles to find a happy work-life balance.

name: Pathfinder
summary_text: A Viking boy is left behind after his clan battles a Native American tribe. Raised within the tribe, he ultimately becomes their savior in a fight against the Norsemen.

name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
summary_text: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

name: Instinct
summary_text: A former CIA operative (Cumming), who has since built a "normal" life as a gifted professor and writer, is pulled back into his old life when the NYPD needs his help to stop a serial killer on the loose.

name: Colors
summary_text: An experienced cop and his rookie partner patrol the streets of East Los Angeles while trying to keep the gang violence under control.

name: Herself
summary_text: A young mother escapes her abusive husband and fights back against a broken housing system. She sets out to build her own home and in the process rebuilds her life and re-discovers herself.

name: Meteor Garden
summary_text: An ordinary girl is admitted to the most prestigious school in the country where she encounters F4, an exclusive group comprised of the four wealthiest and handsomest boys in the school - Dao Ming Si, Hua Ze Lei, Xi Men and Mei Zuo.

name: Still Alice
summary_text: A linguistics professor and her family find their bonds tested when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease.

name: The Last Days of American Crime
summary_text: In the not-too-distant future, as a final response to terrorism and crime, the U.S. government plans to broadcast a signal making it impossible for anyone to knowingly commit unlawful acts.

name: Mystery Road
summary_text: Detective Jay Swan is assigned to investigate a mysterious disappearance on an outback cattle station. Soon, Jay's investigation uncovers a past injustice that threatens the fabric of the whole community.

name: Army of One
summary_text: Out hiking, Special Forces Brenner Baker stumbles onto a Cartel's compound. Her husband's killed and she's left for dead. The Cartel made two mistakes, killing her husband and leaving her alive. They won't live to make another.

name: Driving Miss Daisy
summary_text: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

name: Night Shift
summary_text: A morgue attendant is talked into running a brothel at his workplace after a deceased pimp is sent there. However, the pimp's killers don't look too kindly on this new 'business', nor does the morgue's owner.

name: Light of My Life
summary_text: Parent and child journey through the outskirts of society a decade after a pandemic has wiped out half the world's population. As a father struggles to protect his child, their bond, and the character of humanity, is tested.

name: He Got Game
summary_text: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

name: Liar
summary_text: British psychological thriller in which schoolteacher Laura Nielson accuses renowned surgeon Andrew Earlham of rape.

name: Kubo and the Two Strings
summary_text: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

name: My Blue Heaven
summary_text: An all too uptight FBI agent must protect a larger than life mobster with a heart of gold, currently under witness protection in the suburbs.

name: Blow-Up
summary_text: A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

name: Life
summary_text: A former police officer returns to the force after having been wrongly imprisoned for years.

name: Hustle
summary_text: A washed-up basketball scout discovers a phenomenal street ball player while in China and sees the prospect as his opportunity to get back into the NBA.

name: Runaway Jury
summary_text: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

name: Downhill
summary_text: Barely escaping an avalanche during a family ski vacation in the Alps, a married couple is thrown into disarray as they are forced to reevaluate their lives and how they feel about each other.

name: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
summary_text: Commonly known as the "Dungeon," the city of Orario possesses a huge labyrinth in the underground. Its strange name attracts excitement, illusions of honor, and hopes of romance with a ...                See full summary »

name: Flames
summary_text: A teenage romance from The Timeliners that aims straight from the heart. This web-series is the story of a young romance unfolding as a chemical reaction.

name: Our Idiot Brother
summary_text: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.

name: Summer Rental
summary_text: An overworked air-traffic controller takes his family on a beach vacation but is soon beset by series of mishaps.

name: Pearson
summary_text: Attorney Jessica Pearson enters the complex and seedy world of Chicago politics.

name: Space Cowboys
summary_text: When retired engineer Frank Corvin (Clint Eastwood) is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

name: Mr. Holland's Opus
summary_text: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

name: Raatchasan
summary_text: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

name: Forensic Files
summary_text: A series featuring detailed accounts on how notable crimes and diseases were solved through forensic science.

name: La Luna
summary_text: A fable of a young boy coming of age in the most peculiar of circumstances. It's the first time his Papa and Grandpa are taking him to work. Will he be able to find his own way?

name: Arthur
summary_text: Alcoholic billionaire playboy Arthur Bach must marry a woman he does not love, or he will be cut off from his $750,000,000 fortune. But when Arthur falls in love with a poor waitress, he must decide if he wants to choose love or money.

name: My Life Is Murder
summary_text: My Life is Murder follows the adventures of fearless private investigator Alexa Crowe, who solves the most baffling crimes as well as coping with the frustrations of everyday life.

name: Julie & Julia
summary_text: Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book.

name: The Shining
summary_text: A recovering alcoholic must wrestle with demons within and without when he and his family move into a haunted hotel as caretakers.

name: Born a Champion
summary_text: Mickey Kelley, one of the first American black belts in Brazilian jiu-jitsu, gets pulled away from everything he loves and into an unsanctioned MMA tournament.

name: Lionheart
summary_text: An Ex-French Soldier begins participating in underground street fights in order to make money for his brother's family.

name: Copycat
summary_text: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

name: Drop Dead Diva
summary_text: A vapid aspiring model killed in a car crash gets brought back to life as an intelligent, overweight lawyer, hoping to find the meaning of inner beauty.

name: Little Italy
summary_text: A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.

name: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse
summary_text: Mickey and his friends Minnie, Donald, Pluto, Daisy, Goofy, Pete, Clarabelle and more go on fun and educational adventures.

name: Huss
summary_text: New police officer Katarina Huss has to manage the tough life in Gothenburg and suspicious colleagues and she soon finds herself in a tangle of corruption and betrayal.

name: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
summary_text: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.

name: The Man Who Wasn't There
summary_text: A laconic, chain-smoking barber blackmails his wife's boss and lover for money to invest in dry cleaning, but his plan goes terribly wrong.

name: Air Emergency
summary_text: Dramatized reconstruction of real-life air disasters, along with interviews with aviation experts and eyewitnesses.

name: Dark Places
summary_text: Libby Day was only eight years old when her family was brutally murdered in their rural Kansas farmhouse. Almost thirty years later, she reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime and uncovers the wrenching truths that led up to that tragic night.

name: Can You Ever Forgive Me?
summary_text: When Lee Israel falls out of step with current tastes, she turns her art form to deception.

name: The Young Victoria
summary_text: A dramatization of the turbulent first years of Queen Victoria's rule, and her enduring romance with Prince Albert.

name: Tesla
summary_text: A freewheeling take on visionary inventor Nikola Tesla, his interactions with Thomas Edison and J.P. Morgan's daughter Anne, and his breakthroughs in transmitting electrical power and light.

name: A Fall from Grace
summary_text: Disheartened since her ex-husband's affair, Grace Waters feels restored by a new romance. But when secrets erode her short-lived joy, Grace's vulnerable side turns violent.

name: Jeremiah Johnson
summary_text: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

name: Just Cause
summary_text: A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.

name: Plebs
summary_text: PLEBS follows three desperate young men from the suburbs as they try to get laid, hold down jobs, and climb the social ladder in the big city - a city that happens to be Ancient Rome.

name: Watership Down
summary_text: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

name: Everything Sucks!
summary_text: In 1990s Oregon, members of a high school A/V club clash with the drama club.

name: Blackout
summary_text: Academy Award® winner Rami Malek stars in this apocalyptic thriller as a small-town radio DJ fighting to protect his family and community after the power grid goes down nationwide, upending...                See full summary »

name: The Ride
summary_text: The inspiring story of a BMX champion who overcame an abusive childhood through the love and life lessons of his interracial foster family.

name: Launchpad
summary_text: A collection of 6 short films. Six filmmakers from underrepresented backgrounds were selected and provided with the opportunity to share their perspectives and creative visions that will show audiences what it means to be seen.

name: Black Christmas
summary_text: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

name: The Commitments
summary_text: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

name: Lizzie McGuire
summary_text: The daily adventures of an adolescent girl whose real thoughts and emotions are expressed by her sarcastic animated alter ego.

name: Red Tails
summary_text: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.
The events leading up to an 11:14 p.m. car crash, from five very different perspectives.

name: Darkman
summary_text: A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

name: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
summary_text: A young programmer starts to question reality when he adapts a mad writer's fantasy novel into a video game.

name: The Aeronauts
summary_text: A balloon pilot and a scientist find themselves in a fight for survival while attempting to make discoveries in a gas balloon in the 1860s.

name: The Pink Panther
summary_text: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

name: The Power of the Dog
summary_text: A pair of brothers who own a large ranch in Montana are pitted against each other when one of them gets married.

name: The Green Hornet
summary_text: Following the death of his father, Britt Reid, heir to his father's large company, teams up with his late dad's assistant Kato to become a masked crime fighting team.

name: The Grinch
summary_text: A grumpy Grinch (Benedict Cumberbatch) plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

name: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
summary_text: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use their young houseguests to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other over the course of a distressing night.

name: Miracles from Heaven
summary_text: Based on the incredible true story of the Beam family.

name: The Substitute
summary_text: Mercenary Shale's team is retired after a (not so) covert mission in Cuba. He becomes substitute teacher at his teacher fiancee's Miami high school to get those behind kneecapping her. His team helps him.

name: Cat People
summary_text: A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.

name: Strange Angel
summary_text: A rocket scientist in 1940s Los Angeles is secretly the disciple of occultist Aleister Crowley.

name: That Girl
summary_text: An aspiring actress moves from her hometown of Brewster, New York, to try to make it big in New York City, having to take several offbeat "temp" jobs to support herself in between her various auditions and bit parts.

name: The Big Blue
summary_text: The rivalry between Enzo and Jacques, two childhood friends and now world-renowned free divers, becomes a beautiful and perilous journey into oneself and the unknown.

name: Beastly
summary_text: A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

name: The Wind that Shakes the Barley
summary_text: Against the backdrop of the Irish War of Independence, two brothers fight a guerrilla war against British forces.

name: Father Ted
summary_text: Three misfit priests and their housekeeper live on Craggy Island, not the peaceful and quiet part of Ireland that it seems to be.

name: Coneheads
summary_text: Aliens with conical crania crash-land on Earth.

name: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
summary_text: 13-year-old Rynn Jacobs lives alone in a high-class Quebec small town, but unknown to the neighbors, she is leading a secret and dangerous life.

name: The Man with the Iron Heart
summary_text: As the German Fascists expand their borders, scorching Europe from end to end, two brave Czechs of the Resistance prepare for a suicide mission to assassinate Reinhard Heydrich, the hideous mastermind behind the "Final Solution".

name: Chained
summary_text: An abused and bullied boy discovers and befriends a criminal chained inside an abandoned warehouse, but after a violent betrayal the abused becomes the abuser, putting both their lives in peril.

name: Prime Suspect
summary_text: A female police detective investigates a series of serial murders while dealing with sexist hostility from her male comrades.

name: The Red Violin
summary_text: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

name: Sin Senos No Hay Paraíso
summary_text: Sin Senos No Hay Paraiso tells the tragic story of a young woman named Catalina Santana who's ambition is so strong she'll risk her life, because of her obsession with having larger breasts...                See full summary »

name: Leatherheads
summary_text: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.

name: Head-On
summary_text: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

name: Junior
summary_text: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

name: Little Man
summary_text: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

name: Victor Victoria
summary_text: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

name: Fifty Shades of Black
summary_text: An inexperienced college student meets a wealthy businessman whose sexual practices put a strain on their relationship.

name: One Small Story
summary_text: Santhosh, a youth who is struggling with 'Micro Penis Syndrome' marries Amrutha in an unavoidable situation but continues to postpone their first night nuptials. He comes across a Godwoman who has a herbal medicine to address his problem.

name: Lake Mungo
summary_text: Strange things start happening after a girl is found drowned in a lake.

name: The Secret World of Arrietty
summary_text: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

name: The Curse of Oak Island
summary_text: Rick and Marty Lagina, two brothers from Michigan with a life-long interest in the mystery of Oak Island, renew efforts to discover the legendary treasure with sophisticated machinery.

name: Sweet November
summary_text: A workaholic executive, and an unconventional woman agree to a personal relationship for a short period. In this short period she changes his life.

name: The Next Step
summary_text: As the A-Troupe dancers prepare for the regional dance competition, relationships and loyalties are put to the test at the Next Step studio.
